titles.title: NEPA Accountability and Enforcement Act of 2020
NEPA Accountability and Enforcement Act of 2020
A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 to impose time limits on the completion of certain required actions under the Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
NEPA Accountability and Enforcement Act of 2020
This bills establishes (1) deadlines for federal agencies to complete reviews of the environmental effects of proposed major federal actions, and (2) penalties for agencies that do not comply with these deadlines.
